ABOUTCOMPANY

Maharjan Metal Industries

ABOUT US

Established in 1985, Maharjan Metal Industries has garnered a reputation for excellence in the manufacturing of solar water heaters, water tanks, and provision of plumbing services across Nepal. With a firm commitment to quality, durability, and customer satisfaction, we have solidified our position as a trusted leader in the industry. Over the past three decades, Maharjan Metal Industries has continuously delivered top-notch metal works and solutions to customers throughout the nation. Our dedication to quality craftsmanship and customer-centric approach has earned us the trust and loyalty of clients across various sectors.

OURSERVICES

Produce Your Own Clean Save
The Environment

OUR SERVICES
Custom Solar Water Tank Manufacturing

Maharjan Metal Industry, we specialize in manufacturing solar water tanks from a variety of materials, including Mild Steel, Dip Galvanized Steel, and Stainless Steel. Our tanks come in various capacities ranging from 100 liters to 600 liters, allowing us to meet your specific requirements. Each tank is designed for durability, efficient heat retention, and reliable performance in any environment.

Read More
Solar Panel Manufacturing

We provide solar panels made from premium materials such as aluminum or copper. Maharjan Metal Industry offers panels in different sizes to meet diverse energy needs. Our solar panels are designed to maximize energy efficiency and are customizable to your exact specifications.

Read More
Stainless Steel Water Tank Fabrication

Maharjan Metal Industry manufactures high-quality 304-grade stainless steel water tanks in various sizes to suit your storage needs. These tanks are rust-resistant, long-lasting, and ideal for maintaining the purity and quality of your stored water. Custom sizing is available to meet specific project requirements.

Read More
View More Services
OURFEATURES

Wind Solar Energy work
Project Planning

OUR FEATURES

Inner boiler tank

Special boiler tanks coated using dip galvanized process are available. Due to the fact that the upper and lower wheels of the drum have been pressure tested by shaping it into a dome, the internal parts of the solar boiler tanks are completely strong and trustworthy.

Electric heating system

Our solar water heater set can be equipped with an automatic electric heating system including an indicator, assuring availability of hot water even during winters or cloudy days. This system is optional and is available as per requirement.

Insulation

High quality Vermin Proof Fiber Wool is used keeping water inside the boiler tanks warm for longer period of time.

Outer Shell

Outer cover with aluminum dome made from thick sheets protects the boiler tanks from physical damage and weathering. Also, these colorful outer shell looks attractive.

Solar Panels

High quality special black paint is applied on solar panel and thick aluminum sheets with durable panel box and stand are used during manufacturing. These panel comes with colorful frames making them attractive and strong.

Rubber Seal

Since a special rubber seal is placed between the solar panel and the glass, it can get rid of the hassle of changing the rubber seal and painting it every year.

OURPROCESS

Important tips to consider before installation

OUR PROCESS
01
Location for solar heater and the hot water pipeline installation should be consulted with skilled technician while building the house.
02
It is advisable to keep the hot water pipe as short as possible
03
Hot water pipe should be properly insulated. Covering it with insulation tube within thin polythene pipe cover makes them durable.
04
Location for solar set placement should be out in open space facing South and should not be shaded. At least from 11:00 am to 4:00 pm, it is important to get good sunlight.
05
Cold water tank should be at least 5 1/2 feet above the solar water heater set. Height of 6 feet or above is even better.
06
In order to use a pressure pump, the manufacturer should be informed in advance and the pressure tested solar set should be installed accordingly.
07
Get complete information about the build quality and liter capacity of solar before installing the solar set.
08
Be aware that most imported vacuum tube water heater sets lack maintenance facilities/ after installation services.
QUESTIONSFOR US

Best Solar Water Heater in Nepal

FAQS

Our solar water heaters are built using high-quality materials and components to ensure longevity and durability. From corrosion-resistant tanks to efficient solar collectors, every aspect of our heaters is designed for superior performance.

Our solar water heaters utilize advanced technology to efficiently harness solar energy and heat water. With innovative designs and engineering, our heaters provide fast and consistent hot water supply, even in challenging weather conditions.

We offer a wide range of solar water heater systems to suit various needs and requirements. Whether you need a small system for a residential home or a larger system for a commercial or institutional building, we can customize a solution to fit your specific needs.

Our team of skilled technicians ensures proper installation and setup of our solar water heaters, maximizing their performance and efficiency. We take care of every detail to ensure seamless integration with your existing plumbing system.

At Maharjan Metal Industries, customer satisfaction is our top priority. We provide personalized attention and support to our customers throughout the entire process, from initial consultation to after-sales service and maintenance.

With a long history of delivering reliable and high-quality solar water heaters, Maharjan Metal Industries has earned the trust and loyalty of customers across Nepal. Our track record speaks for itself, making us the preferred choice for solar water heating solutions.
